overview: Kathy joined Spectrum in April of 2000 as Manager of Investor Services. Her focus is producing investor communications such as quarterly and annual reports, fund updates for limited partners, the annual investor meeting, presentations, and fund marketing materials. In addition, Kathy maintains the investor database and processes partner transfers. Prior to joining Spectrum, Kathy was manager of investor services at Paul Capital Partners, director of corporate services at Glenborough, and a corporate portfolio analyst at Metric Realty.
